projects.title: Melissa B2B
projects.shortDescription: B2B platform for Melissa's resellers, with complete checkout and specific features for the fashion market.
projects.description: I participated in the development of the B2B platform for Melissa from conception to final delivery. The project required collaboration with multiple teams (Frontend, Backend, QA, Architecture and Client) to create a scalable, efficient and fully adapted solution to the needs of resellers. The platform was designed to optimize purchase, order and catalog management flows, ensuring practicality and a better user experience in the corporate environment.
features: Development of product listing pages (PLP) with advanced filters using Endeca
Creation of configurable and reusable components for consistency and scalability
Creation and customization of email templates in OCC, ensuring visual consistency and customization for different types of notifications
Implementation of detailed product pages (PDP) with integrated information
Complete development of the B2B checkout flow
Implementation of the Split delivery (home delivery + store pickup)
Integration with real-time stock and freight calculation API
Account management features: update data, order summary and details, password change and more
Catalog management, filters and settings via OCC panel
Code reviews and refactoring for continuous improvement
projects.detailedTechnologies: Frontend: React.js, Redux, Styled-Components, integration with REST APIs of Oracle Commerce Cloud (OCC). Backend: Node.js, Express. Methodology: Scrum, with focus on incremental deliveries, quality and collaboration between multidisciplinary teams.
